text: Adrianus Josephus Elisabeth "Ad" Havermans (25 August 1934 â€“ 8 March 2022) was a Dutch politician. He was a member of the Catholic People's Party (KVP) and later the Christian Democratic Appeal (CDA). He was mayor of several municipalities, among which of The Hague from 1985 to 1996. Havermans was born in Bergen op Zoom. He died in The Hague at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Dutch civil servants Category:Dutch mayors Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Mayors of The Hague Category:Politicians from North Brabant
title: Ad Havermans
